hero_title: The Place Where Steps Leave Traces
hero_subtitle: A place beyond formulas, empty words and dogmas - a place dedicated to the world of children's fantasy and imagination.
about_text: Exploratorium is a place beyond formulas, empty words, and dogmas - a place dedicated to the world of boundless childlike fantasy and imagination. Here, children are free to express themselves, develop, and learn, entirely at their own pace. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
